meanings.definition: Yaffs (verb): to laugh or chatter noisily
meanings.sent1: The children yaffs happily during recess.
meanings.sent2: She always yaffs loudly at jokes.
meanings.sent3: The parrot yaffs along with the music, creating a funny atmosphere.
meanings.sent4: The room was filled with yaffs, like a symphony of joyous sounds.
meanings.sent5: His infectious yaffs could be heard from miles away.

meanings.definition: Yaffs (noun): loud, raucous laughter or chatter
meanings.sent1: The yaffs of the audience filled the theater.
meanings.sent2: Her yaffs echoed through the room, bringing smiles to everyone.
meanings.sent3: The yaffs of the monkeys in the zoo made visitors giggle.
meanings.sent4: The yaffs of the crowd were like music to his ears.
meanings.sent5: The yaffs of the party guests could be heard from the street.
